entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Failing test -`System.IO.Tests.File_GetSetTimes_SafeFileHandle_Pathless.WritingShouldUpdateWriteTime_After_SetLastAccessTime` on windows/x86 #95298
    9.0.0
  • Android SslStream splits messages over 2048 bytes in multiple TLS records (breaks MS-TDS protocol) #95295
  • GeneratedRegex source file RegexGenerator.g.cs not found by debugger #95293
  • Arm64: Casting a specific double value to uint32 caused an unexpected divide by zero to occur #95290
  • CA1857: hundred or thousands of build warnings from System.Runtime.Intrinsics.X86 on updating from .NET 7.0 to 8.0 #95289
  • [wasm] Create an optional job for HybridGlobalization on CI #95282
  • [browser] run dotnet in service worker #95277
    Future
  • [wasi] Single file build fails with AOT #95273
  • JsonConverter for {ReadOnly}Memory doesn't deserialize nulls #95267
    9.0.0
  • Invalid suppression in `TypeConverter` when loading a custom converter type #95265
  • [API Proposal]: QuicConnection.ConnectionClosed task #95263
  • Trim analyzer doesn't warn on mismatched annotations through method group conversions #95258
    9.0.0
  • mono debug component not able to re-connect after disconnect #95256
    8.0.x
  • [API Proposal]: WebProxy.GetSystemProxy #95252

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: Stringbuilder.Replace(ROS oldValue, ROS newValue, int index, int count) #77837
  • (Error .Net Core 5) "Directory.GetDirectories("D:")" returns not existingDirectory #68503
    9.0.0
  • System.Security.Cryptography.Tests timing out #93840
    9.0.0
  • Test timeout in System.Security.Cryptography.OpenSsl.Tests on mono Amd64 OSX #94436
    9.0.0
  • [.NET 8] <PublishTrimmed> no longers works but throws build process for an infinite loop #94831
    8.0.x
  • [API Proposal]: Add a `Utf8JsonWriter.WriteRawValue(ReadOnlySequence<byte>)` overload. #95185
    Future
  • Dotnet run breaks when AssemblyName ends on Service #93716
  • Authentication - An extended error has occurred. #95214
  • [corehost] Return value of library_exists_in_dir is disregarded #81355
    Future
  • .Net 7 performance regression with struct fields #87720
    Future
  • JIT: Support SIMD sized remainders in physical promotion #88318
    9.0.0
  • Environment.GetFolderPath returns different than .NET 7 on MacOS in .NET 8 #95269
  • .net core 8 not working on a brand new Mac ARM 64 #95259
    8.0.x
  • Bounds check not eliminated with enumerator #78000
    9.0.0
  • DOTNET_JitDisasm output (redirected to file) gets garbled with big dumps #95261
  • instrDescDebugInfo should store compile time handles #77789
    Future
  • Improve test coverage for TLS resume #75545
    9.0.0
  • check-labels action doesn't remove past results #91691
  • Support xcode 15 #92260
  • S1125: Remove the unucessary Boolean literal(s) codefix is producing wrong fix #95255
  • SetFileInformationByHandle uses incorrect parameters on Win32 #95096
    9.0.0
  • VS default settings drops rejit requests without failing them #95172

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix ILLink/ILC hang when tracking too many hoisted local values #95302
    Servicing-consider, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, area-Tools-ILLink
  • JIT: Generalize check for full interruptibility #95299
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove FindTypeDef api where appropriate. #95297
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Alternative fix for RuntimeHelpers.GetSubArray AOT compatibility warning #95296
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Allow specifying IndentText when writing JSON #95292
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add memory randomization runs #95291
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [NO-MERGE] CoreCLR runtime instrumentation for measuring type load performance #95288
    NO-MERGE, area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Initial check to enable EventPipe support #95287
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Improve the hash function used in the `InstMethodHashTable` #95285
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-coreclr
  • JIT: alt jit range #95283
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasi] Add AOT option to existing Wasi.Build.Tests #95281
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono, needs-author-action, os-wasi
  • Fix _AssemblyInTargetingPack value during servicing #95278
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add JSON null support for the built-in (ReadOnly)Memory converters. #95275
    area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.0
  • Use managed ntlm on linux-bionic #95274
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Update ILLink.Tasks.csproj #95272
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [release/8.0-staging] [mono][System.Reflection.Emit] Fix explicitly setting the return type on a dynamic method #95271
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-reflection-mono, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0-staging] [mono][debugger] If debugger is disconnected but vm is not exited restart the debugger thread #95270
    Servicing-consider, area-Debugger-mono, 8.0.x
  • [mono][debugger] If debugger is disconnected but vm is not exited restart the debugger thread #95266
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [browser] Document `DebuggerSupport` for non-debug configurations #95262
    documentation, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization implement GetSortKey on hybrid mode #95260
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios

Merged

  • Switch SingleFileApiTests to pre-built test asset #95280
    test-enhancement, area-Host
  • Do not Path.Join user directory if it's "C:" #94587
    area-System.IO, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 9.0.0
  • bump-chrome-version.yml: Use `.dotnet/dotnet` if available, else use the system installed one #95286
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix performance of System.Security. Cryptography.Tests #95284
    area-System.Security, test-enhancement
  • Fix ILLink/ILC hang when tracking too many hoisted local values #95041
    area-Tools-ILLink, needs-area-label
  • Add Arm64 encodings for IF_SVE_AA_3A to IF_SVE_HL_3A #95127
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #95163
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'release/7.0-staging' #95162
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #95164
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • JIT: Assert bbJumpKind in BasicBlock::HasJump #95152
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • add README.md for System.Console #95254
    documentation, area-System.Console, 9.0.0
  • Fix typo in testenv for cross-block local assertion prop #94978
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable MetricEventSourceTest on Mono on Windows x86 #95211
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric
  • Delete dead code (HashIdentity) #95246
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [wasi] Wasi.Build.Tests - unblock single file bundle test on Windows #95268
    arch-wasm, disabled-test, area-VM-meta-mono, os-wasi
  • Rename `library_exists_in_dir` to `file_exists_in_dir` and remove some unnecessary string allocations #95154
    area-Host
  • [browser] JSImport binding improvements #95177
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • StringBuilder.Replace with ReadOnlySpan<char> #93938
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Improve `.Distinct().ToList()` and `.Union(e).ToList()` #95224
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • Fix invalid parameters in SetFileInformationByHandle #95235
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 9.0.0

Updated

  • Convert HELPER_METHOD_FRAME to QCalls (2/N) #95233
    area-Interop-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Add PropertyBuilder implementation #95303
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • [PERF] DaysInMonth optimization #95229
    community-contribution, needs-author-action, area-System.DateTime
  • [wasi] CI: Add AOT library tests job #95146
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Combine rootDir with relative file names #94528
    NO-MERGE, breaking-change, area-Extensions-FileSystem, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Factor SSA's DFS and profile synthesis's loop finding #95251
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve the hashtable for EEClassHash #94825
    area-VM-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove questionable transformation #95249
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update coreclr test run scripts #95237
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add EventSource event for WaitHandle waits #94737
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • JIT: Remove BBJ_NONE #94239
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Move many interop tests to run in-proc and move many to built in the merged runner itself #94109
    test-enhancement, area-Interop-coreclr
  • Implement Interlocked for small types. #92974
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add new Pipeline for Running Libs Tests with TestReadyToRun #91229
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Disable implicit rejection for RSA PKCS#1 v1.5 #95216
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security, 8.0.x
  • [release/7.0-staging] Disable implicit rejection for RSA PKCS#1 v1.5 #95217
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security, 7.0.x
  • [release/6.0-staging] Disable implicit rejection for RSA PKCS#1 v1.5 #95218
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security, 6.0.x
  • Optimize capturing lambdas in `DependencyContextExtensions` and `DependencyContextJsonReader` #92462
    area-DependencyModel, community-contribution
  • Replace `pushd/popd` Calls With `-S/-B` CMake Flags in the Build System #94353
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Implements new `int`and `long` overloads for `TimeSpan` #94143
    new-api-needs-documentation, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action, area-System.DateTime, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Disallow loop increments in the top block #95227
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT ARM64/SVE2: Add increment/decrement from predicate register instructions #94811
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Trimming: Add tests for handling of annotated string type names representing generic instantiations #95143
    area-Tools-ILLink, 9.0.0
  • Enable EVEX feature: Embedded Rounding for Avx512F.Add() #94684
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • [NO-MERGE] PR benchmark playground #95142
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Sockets
  • JIT: enable cross-block local assertion prop #94689
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add tests for Task.WhenAll #93619
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, community-contribution
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization use system ICU #93220
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Reenable consumption of PGO data #91297
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [API Implementation]: CngProperty constructor with ReadOnlySpan<byte> overload #93805
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Improve System.DirectoryServices interop guidelines conformance #93722
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • [mono] Add runtime support for Swift calling convention on x64 and arm64 #94764
    area-VM-meta-mono, new-api-needs-documentation, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • `JsonSerializerOptions.Web` for `JsonSerializerOptions` #94370
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [mono][System.Reflection.Emit] Fix explicitly setting the return type on a dynamic method #95183
    area-VM-reflection-mono
  • Implement straightforward ServicePoint(Manager) properties in HttpWebRequest #94664
    area-System.Net
  • [browser] js string marshaling by value #95180
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Wraping both declaration and definition in #ifndef DISABLE_LOGGING. #91042
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Extend mono_gsharedvt_constrained_call for static calls and handle nullable value types #94787
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Additional QuicConnectionOptions #94211
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic
  • System.Console cleanup #93828
    area-System.Console, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • [RISC-V] Implement some of the NYI methods in unwindriscv64 #95128
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [mono] Handle Assert failure when GetDelegateForFunctionPointer is invoked with VoidDelegate type #79530
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • [CI ONLY] [NativeAOT] ObjWriter in C# #92705
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Delete `GT_CNS_LNG` #85951
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Delete simple quirks left from the `ASG` removal #86726
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Delete `BBF_FAILED_VERIFICATION` and `BBF_FUNCLET_BEG` #93483
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Add crossgen2 for riscv64 #95188
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [RISC-V] Floating NaN overflow test fix #94168

    NO-MERGE, area-Meta, community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [NativeAOT] Aging stacks #95221

  • Move ManagedToNativeGenerator out-of-process #94446
    area-Build-mono
  • [RISC-V] Implement NativeWalker. #94853
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-27
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [NativeAOT LLVM] Support dotnet.js #2434

PullRequests

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Rewrite `install-llvm.ps1` to be usable locally #2441
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Merge nov 23 #2419

Updated

  • [Async-2] Fix resumption stub target in the presence of backpatching #2428
    area-async
  • [Async-2]: Tasklet aging #2425
    area-async
  • Try to see if this will make the CI somewhat ok with our roslyn build… #2423
    area-async
  • [Async-2] A few small tweaks on the managed side of state-machine based implementation. #2431
    area-async

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Fatal error. System.AccessViolationException: Attempted to read or write protected memory. This is often an indication that other memory is corrupt. #37169
  • Workload messages are busy or unclear #37163
  • `dotnet workload list --machine-readable` prints workload update messages to stdout #37161
  • aka.ms sdk-productversion.txt is outdated #37150
  • Visual Studio 2022 17.8.1 Debug .net core 3.1 app throw System.IO.FileNotFoundException on start up before execute Main entry #37157

Closed

  • dotnet new template for `Directory.Packages.props` file #36367
  • NET6 -> NET8 upgrade breaks the docker build ARM64 #37148

PullRequests

Created

  • parse auth scheme case-insensitively #37165
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Disable Source Link in desktop WPF temp projects #37164
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Treat rtm as stable Fixes #36500 #37160
    untriaged, Area-Workloads

Merged

  • [release/8.0.1xx] [HotReload] Skips Browser refresh middleware when running against an unsupported target framework version #37159
    Servicing-approved, Area-AspNetCore
  • [HotReload] Skips Browser refresh middleware when running against an unsupported target framework version #37139
  • add packagesprops template #36387
    untriaged, Area-dotnet new

Updated

  • Fix incorrect app host used in build when PublishSingleFile=true #37114
    area-Single-File, untriaged
  • [Blazor] Replace `webapp,razor` with `blazor` on `dotnet new` #36657
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Let runtime supply the portable RID graph #36807
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2323969 #36923
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Product Version Incorrect as of .NET 8 and VS 17.8 #70973
  • Integration test deadlock caused by improper use of JTF in ExtensionManagerService #70966
  • IDE0083 code fix on nullable value types results in code that does not compile afterwards #70964

Closed

  • Ship Roslyn devkit assembly as a downloadable component #69467
  • Intellisense for member override candidates should filter out hidden members in base classes. #21418
    Backlog
  • Ref returns/locals: Extract Method does not generate ref-returning methods #8439
    Backlog
  • Not able to specify target framework when creating ProjectInfo instance. #70968
  • 'using unsafe' alias is missing appropriate coloring #70967

PullRequests

Created

  • added preproc for Core specific RCC download paths #70974
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Improve codegen for concatenation of `string` and `char` #70971
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.9
  • Test both csproj and CPS #70970
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Exclude more errors from those that fail delegate conversion #70965
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • To not offer overrrides that woudl collide with existing members #70944
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Update extract-method to respect returning by-ref #70931
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix comment #70969
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Do not try to share syntax trees in languages that don't have them #70955
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Support XAML LSP in VS Code #70170
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Avoid redundant `HasValue` call in lifted custom binary operator #70934
    Area-Compilers, Code Gen Quality, untriaged
  • Add GetSemanticModel method with disableNullableAnalysis flag #70912
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Emit `readonly.` for constrained array access #70949
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Generate async methods #70941
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Flip 'pull diagnostics' to be on by default. #70040
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Delay slicing in list pattern until all other element patterns are matched #70615
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, 17.9
  • Make sure completion always use frozen partial semantic #70926
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Create a Razor language server cohosted in Roslyn #70819
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Log solution state on test failure #70961
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Utilize IVsAsyncFileChangeEx2 #70936
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update to vs-extension-testing 0.1.184-beta #70960
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: IOperation support #70650
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • RETRY_AFTER is null in Lease object in case of SlidingWindow rate limiter #52411
  • After upgrade to 8.0.0, setting AOT compilation to true breaks published Blazor app. #52410
  • Removal of index.html in .net 8 needs a migration tip for apache servers #52409
  • Flaky test ChangingUserNameDuringReconnectLogsWarning #52408
  • Flaky test: LocationChangingHandlers_CannotCancelTheNavigationAsynchronously_UntilReturning #52407
  • What Should We Expect the First Load of InteractivityWasm #52406
  • Custom state not set for OpenIdConnectProtocolValidator #52400
  • QuickGrid Samples Website crashes when scrolling all the way to the to bottom on the Remote data QuickGrid #52392
    Planning: WebUI
  • Problem providing Access Token to HttpClient in Interactive Server mode #52390
    Planning: WebUI
  • NET 8 minimal API: Error in AspNetCore.Authentication.JwtBearer 8.0.0 #52388
  • Perf improvement: mvc #52386
  • SignalR Json Protocol version upgraded to version 2 generates problems with old servers on BlazorApps #52385
  • NETSDK1082 : 'browser-wasm' #52384
  • Trying to Render HTML for a HTMX integration.. #52382

Closed

  • [Blazor] Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebView.props is not imported by Maui apps #42348
    6.0.x
  • Support F# `Async<'T>` as an awaitable type in minimal APIs #46773
    Backlog
  • HTTP Gone (410) In `Http.Results` APIs #52376
  • Improve DevX when working with Blazor components compiled to custom elements #50787
    Discussions
  • Perf regression: json #52378
  • Error on Blazor FileInput upload - The format of value '' is invalid #52375
  • ASP.NET Core WebAPI includes InvariantGlobalization setting in .csproj in .NET 8 but is not stated as a change. #52319
  • React SPA template is cumbersome to use when adding new API routes due to the proxy requirement #37103
    Planning: WebUI
  • Support Pointer Events in Blazor #36508
    Planning: WebUI

PullRequests

Created

  • gRPC JSON transcoding — Fixed parsing string values into enum when provided string is not valid enum value #52402
    area-grpc, community-contribution
  • Fix deserializing null properties to Protobuf types #52398
    area-grpc

Merged

  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Fix type name hashing when the type has multibyte characters #52316
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 8.0.1
  • Add support for F# `Async<'T>` as an awaitable type in minimal APIs #46898
    community-contribution, area-minimal, 9.0-preview1
  • [Blazor] Update MSBuild targets so they get imported correctly (main) #52301
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview1
  • [Blazor] Update MSBuild targets so they get imported correctly (8.0) #52300
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, 8.0.1
  • [Blazor] Update MSBuild targets so they get imported correctly (7.0) #52298
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 7.0.15
  • [Blazor] Update MSBuild targets so they get imported correctly (6.0). #52260
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 6.0.26
  • [Blazor] Try to load the assembly when finding out a root component or a parameter in webassembly #52351
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 8.0.1
  • Update SDK version #52405
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • Fixed a typo in AddDbContextCheck comment #52391
    community-contribution, area-networking, area-middleware, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • Improve Blazor project template #52234
    Servicing-consider, area-blazor, 8.0.x
  • Add ProblemDetials.Extensions to ControllerBase.Problem and ControllerBase.ValidationProblem #50204
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Fixed HostFilteringMiddleware. Added HostFilteringMiddleware.MiddlewareConfigurationManager #52038
    community-contribution, area-middleware, 9.0-preview1
  • http.sys: Allow configuring HTTP_AUTH_EX_FLAGs as options #51833
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Clean up helix retry list #52313
    needs-area-label
  • Fix enhanced form handling use defalt enctype, honor enctype and formenctype #52359
    area-blazor
  • Add HTTP Gone (410) result #52377
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, area-networking

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-27
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Pinpointing a static gcroot with sos #1922
    8.0.0
  • libsosplugin cannot be loaded into lldb (macos arm64) #4259
    8.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Soft Keyboard Input Mode doesn't work on .NET MAUI Blazor 8.0.3 (Android) #19066
  • ListView + Rotation = no data view before returning to the app #19065
  • [iOS] Item Sizing Strategy Gallery currently doesn't display items consistently. #19064
  • iOS Background Task is not getting executed in every 15 min time #19063
  • FontFamily is not recognized in Unpackaged application in net 8 #19061
  • Make SetCurrent / SetImplementation calls public #19057
    Backlog
  • TapGestureRecognizer.Tapped event not triggered on certain controls #19056
  • [Android] Unable to set Button CornerRadius to 0 #19052
    Backlog
  • [UITEST] ScrollView Enable Legacy Tests #19051
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • [UITEST] CollectionView Enable Legacy Tests #19050
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • Equals sign (`=`) no longer valid in a project name with .net8.0 #19043
  • Shell switching page problem #19042
  • Can't compile on Mac #19039

Closed

  • UnFocus does not work on Entries inside CollectionView. #19032
  • [regression/7.0.81] Strange padding problem using grid #16598
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • BindingExpression.Apply null reference crash #19020
  • [WinUI] ScrollView does not layout contents if they don't change in size. #14377
    Under Consideration
  • Splash screen bug #18890
  • BindableObject.SetValueCore null reference crash #19021
  • [tests] Fail on EnsureCellSizesAreCached DeviceTest iOS 15.4 and 14.5 #18985 #18986
    .NET 8 SR1
  • Entry does not lose focus on tapping outside #19062
  • ScrollView does not scroll when is inside a StackLayout #19017
  • Maps on Windows fails with "Handler not found" #19040
  • iOS : if Splashscreen is not set, Status Bar is always visible #18885
  • Unable to build with AOT enabled #18839
  • Can't Find my Vivo mobile Device (Android version 12) as a debugging device in Visual Studio Community #19049
  • Project using MultiPage migrated from Xamarin faults on MAUI - Resubmission #6024
    Backlog
  • OnIdom or StaticResource typo's create an app crash in release mode #14427
    Backlog
  • MAUI iOS Background Task Documentation missing #19041
  • Target Android Framework Not Settable Via UI #19024
  • Android App Fails in Release Build on Android 14 #19027
  • Android API 34 app startup crash #19023
  • Problem with binding native IOS Library #18909
  • Navigation page on iOS shows only blank page with images in the wrong positions #18042
  • iOS ScrollView stops working when keyboard is open #18776
  • Add PointerPressed and PointerReleased events and commands to PointerGestureRecognizer #13346
    .NET 8 SR1

PullRequests

Created

  • [tests] Ignore InputTransparencyGalleryTests matrix of UITests #19060
    area/testing, testing-flakiness
  • [Android] Allow setting Button CornerRadius to 0 #19059
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • Add legacy ScrollView UITests #19054
  • Create a new UITest for ModalPageMarginCorrectAfterKeyboardOpens #19048
    platform/android 🤖, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [Testing] Fix flaky ShapeUpdatesBrushCorrectly test #19047
    area/drawing ✏️, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Add better exception for missing Maps on Windows #19046
    platform/windows 🪟, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/Maps🗺

Merged

  • [Blazor] Fix static file handling so that it special cases modules.json (main) #18953
  • ScrollView content needs layout when ScrollView.InvalidateMeasure is called #17639
    area/layout 🔲, partner/hot-reload-xaml, .NET 8 SR1
  • [tests] Add the default dotnet path on iOS #19058
    area/testing
  • Revert "Prevent iOS CollectionView size shifts from clearing the cell size cache" #18988
    area/testing, testing-flakiness, .NET 8 SR1
  • [MacCatalyst] Implement PointerPressed and PointerReleased #16925
    area/gestures, .NET 8 SR1

Updated

  • Add support for running Appium tests with BrowserStack #18312
    area/testing
  • Disconnect property changes from all pages when TabbedPage set to null #18458
    area/TabbedPage, community ✨
  • [iOS] Fix gestures in Label Spans #15544
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, s/pr-needs-author-input, stale, area/gestures, .NET 8 SR2
  • Process the hardware enter key as "Done" #16386
    area/controls 🎮, Under Consideration
  • [Android] Avoid possible crash using essentials Battery #18386
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/essentials 🍞
  • Fix for button cornerradius 0 on android #18959
    community ✨

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • My DTOs without DBSet declaration in DB Context class, are still generating separate tables. #32426
  • Navigation property filtering performance #32425
  • EF8 Breaking Change: Annotation Removed (Minor) #32424
  • Query with Contains and FirstOrDefault that worked in EF7 no longer works in EF8 #32423
  • Inconsistent behavior related to relationship cycle #32422
  • Redundant JOIN in simple Where for one-to-many association #32419
  • Interception point that gets the returned data after serialization #32418
  • [bug] Json column Add-Migration error when inheritance exists #32416

Closed

  • dotnet ef dbcontext scaffold runs successfully but does not create any models or update existing models #32405
  • Error " nu1202: package dotnet-ef 8.0.0 is not compatible with net7.0 (.netcoreapp,version=v7.0)" pop up when use command "dotnet tool install --global dotnet-ef" to install dotnet ef tools in Dev 17.7.7 or lower version #32403
  • Loading a Many-to-Many Collection as SplitQuery throws NullReferenceException #32225
    9.0.0
  • Obsolete Attribute breaks EF core #32417
  • SqlServerDateOnlyMemberTranslator referencing DateTime instead of DateOnly #32392
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Implement EF.Parameter #32427

Merged

  • Implement EF.Constant #32412
  • Handle shadow navigations when loading with split queries #32396
  • Allow empty inline collections #32414
  • Do nameof() over DateOnly instead of DateTime #32415

Updated

  • Work on LEAST/GREATEST, Math.Min/Max #32338

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-27
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Installer is failing to synchronize in sourcebuild #17682
  • DownloadFile failing repeatedly on Darwin_Build_Release_x64 despite the file being there #17588
  • Unable to run smoke tests following README instructions #17856
  • Please provide patch-agnostic URLs for runtime downloads #11040

PullRequests

Created

  • Revert "Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx'" #17871
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #17870

Merged

  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0.1xx #17785
  • Download and compare linux-musl-x64 MSFT sdk #17823
  • License scan updates #17833

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #17851
